definitions.body: mighty, esp. of people, strong in numbers (oft. ‖[[רַב]], [[גׇּדוֹל]]) Ge 18:18, Ex 1:9 + 3 t. JE; De 4:38 + 6 t. D, Mic 4:3, Mic 4:7, Zec 8:22, Is 60:22 (opp. [[חָעִיר]]), of locusts Joe 1:6, Joe 2:2, Joe 2:5, cf. v:Joe 2:11; so of [[חַיִל]] Da 11:25; [[עַם לאׂ עָחוּם]], i.e. feeble Pr 30:26 (of the [[שָׁפָן]]); less oft. of individ. ´[[מְלָכִים ע]] Ps 135:10; of waters Is 8:7; ´[[ע]] alone Pr 18:18 the mighty, Da 8:24; Ps 10:10 his mighty ones i.e. claws, of lion, so Ew De Che Bae al.).
numerous, countless (all ‖[[רַב]]): Am 5:12, Ps 35:18; as subst. = many Is 53:12, Pr 7:26.—Is 41:21 v. [[עֲחֻמָה]] sub III. [[עחם]]. below
